text: Yakhana taderake meghamala sadrsa taranga acchadita kare neya, takhana tara khamti mane allahake dakate thake. Atahpara tini yakhana taderake sthalabhagera dike ud'dhara kare anena, takhana tadera ke'u ke'u sarala pathe cale. Kebala mithyacari, akrtajna byakti'i amara nidarsanabali asbikara kare.
